1: -module(port_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    4: 
    5: -export([all/0]).
    6: -export([init_per_suite/1]).
    7: -export([end_per_suite/1]).
    8: 
    9: -export([eval/1]).
   10: -export([call/1]).
   11: -export([return_type/1]).
   12: -export([nested_return_type/1]).
   13: -export([errors/1]).
   14: -export([timeout/1]).
   15: -export([contexts/1]).
   16: -export([init_from_source/1]).
   17: -export([init_from_file/1]).
   18: -export([multiple_vms/1]).
   19: -export([big_input/1]).
   20: -export([performance/1]).
   21: -export([dead_proc/1]).
   22: -export([escaped_control_characters/1]).
   23: 
   24: %% Callbacks
   25: 
   26: all() ->
   27:     [
   28:         eval,
   29:         call,
   30:         return_type,
   31:         timeout,
   32:         nested_return_type,
   33:         errors,
   34:         contexts,
   35:         init_from_source,
   36:         init_from_file,
   37:         multiple_vms,
   38:         performance,
   39:         big_input,
   40:         dead_proc,
   41:         escaped_control_characters
   42:     ].
   43: 
   44: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   45:     application:start(jsx),
   46:     application:start(erlang_v8),
   47:     Config.
   48: 
   49: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   50:     ok.
   51: 
   52: %% Tests
   53: 
   54: eval(_Config) ->
   55:     {ok, P} = erlang_v8:start_vm(),
   56: 
   57:     {ok, Context} = erlang_v8:create_context(P),
   58: 
   59:     {ok, 2} = erlang_v8:eval(P, Context, <<"1 + 1">>),
   60:     {ok, 5} = erlang_v8:eval(P, Context, <<"var a = 3; a + 2;">>),
   61: 
   62:     ok = erlang_v8_vm:destroy_context(P, Context),
   63: 
   64:     erlang_v8:stop_vm(P),
   65:     ok.
   66: 
   67: call(_Config) ->
   68:     {ok, P} = erlang_v8:start_vm(),
   69: 
   70:     {ok, Context} = erlang_v8:create_context(P),
   71:     
   72:     {ok, undefined} = erlang_v8:eval(P, Context, <<"function sum(a, b) { return a + b; }">>),
   73:     {ok, 3} = erlang_v8:call(P, Context, <<"sum">>, [1, 2]),
   74: 
   75:     {ok, 4} = erlang_v8:call(P, Context, <<"sum">>, [2, 2]),
   76:     {ok, <<"helloworld">>} =
   77:         erlang_v8:call(P, Context, <<"sum">>, [<<"hello">>, <<"world">>]),
   78: 
   79:     %% a few arguments
   80:     {ok, undefined} =
   81:         erlang_v8:eval(P, Context, <<"function mul(a, b, c, d) { return a * b * c * d }">>),
   82:     {ok, 1} = erlang_v8:call(P, Context, <<"mul">>, [1, 1, 1, 1]),
   83: 
   84:     %% object arguments
   85:     {ok, undefined} =
   86:         erlang_v8:eval(P, Context, <<"function get(o) { return o.a; }">>),
   87:     {ok, undefined} = erlang_v8:call(P, Context, <<"get">>, [2, 2]),
   88:     {ok, 1} = erlang_v8:call(P, Context, <<"get">>, [[{a, 1}]]),
   89: 
   90:     %% object fun
   91:     {ok, undefined} =
   92:         erlang_v8:eval(P, Context, <<"var x = { y: function z() { return 1; } }">>),
   93:     {ok, 1} = erlang_v8:call(P, Context, <<"x.y">>, []),
   94: 
   95:     {ok, undefined} =
   96:         erlang_v8:eval(P, Context, <<"var x = { y: function z() { return 1; } }">>),
   97:     {ok, 1} = erlang_v8:call(P, Context, <<"x.y">>, []),
   98: 
   99:     ok = erlang_v8_vm:destroy_context(P, Context),
  100: 
  101:     erlang_v8:stop_vm(P),
  102:     ok.
  103: 
  104: return_type(_Config) ->
  105:     {ok, P} = erlang_v8:start_vm(),
  106:     {ok, Context} = erlang_v8:create_context(P),
  107: 
  108:     {ok, 1} = erlang_v8:eval(P, Context, <<"1">>),
  109:     {ok, #{ <<"a">> := 1 }} = erlang_v8:eval(P, Context, <<"x = { a: 1 }; x">>),
  110:     {ok, [1]} = erlang_v8:eval(P, Context, <<"[1]">>),
  111:     {ok, true} = erlang_v8:eval(P, Context, <<"true">>),
  112:     {ok, null} = erlang_v8:eval(P, Context, <<"null">>),
  113:     {ok, 1.1} = erlang_v8:eval(P, Context, <<"1.1">>),
  114: 
  115:     ok = erlang_v8_vm:destroy_context(P, Context),
  116:     erlang_v8:stop_vm(P),
  117:     ok.
  118: 
  119: timeout(_Config) ->
  120:     {ok, VM} = erlang_v8:start_vm(),
  121: 
  122:     {ok, Context1} = erlang_v8:create_context(VM),
  123:     {ok, Context2} = erlang_v8:create_context(VM),
  124: 
  125:     {ok, undefined} = erlang_v8:eval(VM, Context1, <<"var x = 1;">>),
  126:     {ok, 1} = erlang_v8:eval(VM, Context1, <<"x">>),
  127: 
  128:     {error, timeout} = erlang_v8:eval(VM, Context2, <<"while (true) {}">>, 500),
  129: 
  130:     {ok, 1} = erlang_v8:eval(VM, Context1, <<"x">>),
  131: 
  132:     ok = erlang_v8_vm:destroy_context(VM, Context1),
  133:     ok = erlang_v8_vm:destroy_context(VM, Context2),
  134: 
  135:     erlang_v8:stop_vm(VM),
  136:     ok.
  137: 
  138: 
  139: nested_return_type(_Config) ->
  140:     {ok, VM} = erlang_v8:start_vm(),
  141: 
  142:     {ok, Context} = erlang_v8:create_context(VM),
  143: 
  144:     {ok, #{
  145:            <<"val">> := 1,
  146:            <<"list">> := [1, 2, 3],
  147:            <<"obj">> := #{ <<"val">> := 1 }
  148:     }} = erlang_v8:eval(VM, Context, <<"
  149:     var x = {
  150:         val: 1,
  151:         list: [1, 2, 3],
  152:         obj: {
  153:             val: 1
  154:         }
  155:     };
  156:     x
  157:     ">>),
  158: 
  159:     ok = erlang_v8_vm:destroy_context(VM, Context),
  160: 
  161:     erlang_v8:stop_vm(VM),
  162:     ok.
  163:  
  164: errors(_Config) ->
  165:     {ok, P} = erlang_v8:start_vm(),
  166: 
  167:     {ok, Context} = erlang_v8:create_context(P),
  168: 
  169:     {error, <<"exception">>} = erlang_v8:eval(P, Context, <<"throw 'exception';">>),
  170:     {error, <<"ReferenceError: i_do_not_exist is not defined", _/binary>>} =
  171:         erlang_v8:eval(P, Context, <<"i_do_not_exist();">>),
  172: 
  173:     ok = erlang_v8_vm:destroy_context(P, Context),
  174: 
  175:     erlang_v8:stop_vm(P),
  176:     ok.
  177: 
  178: contexts(_Config) ->
  179:     {ok, P} = erlang_v8:start_vm([{source, <<"var erlang_v8 = 'yes';">>}]),
  180: 
  181:     {ok, Context1} = erlang_v8_vm:create_context(P),
  182:     {ok, Context2} = erlang_v8_vm:create_context(P),
  183: 
  184:     {ok, <<"yes">>} = erlang_v8:eval(P, Context1, <<"erlang_v8">>),
  185: 
  186:     {ok, <<"no">>} = erlang_v8:eval(P, Context1, <<"erlang_v8 = 'no';">>),
  187:     {ok, <<"no">>} = erlang_v8:eval(P, Context1, <<"erlang_v8">>),
  188:     {ok, <<"yes">>} = erlang_v8:eval(P, Context2, <<"erlang_v8">>),
  189: 
  190:     ok = erlang_v8_vm:destroy_context(P, Context1),
  191:     ok = erlang_v8_vm:destroy_context(P, Context2),
  192: 
  193:     {error, invalid_context} = erlang_v8:eval(P, Context1, <<"erlang_v8">>),
  194: 
  195:     erlang_v8:stop_vm(P),
  196: 
  197:     ok.
  198: 
  199: init_from_source(_Config) ->
  200:     {ok, VM} = erlang_v8:start_vm([{source, <<"var erlang_v8 = 'yes';">>}]),
  201:     {ok, Context} = erlang_v8_vm:create_context(VM),
  202: 
  203:     {ok, <<"yes">>} = erlang_v8:eval(VM, Context, <<"erlang_v8">>),
  204:     {ok, <<"no">>} = erlang_v8:eval(VM, Context, <<"erlang_v8 = 'no'">>),
  205:     {ok, <<"no">>} = erlang_v8:eval(VM, Context, <<"erlang_v8">>),
  206: 
  207:     {ok, Context2} = erlang_v8_vm:create_context(VM),
  208:     {ok, <<"yes">>} = erlang_v8:eval(VM, Context2, <<"erlang_v8">>),
  209: 
  210:     erlang_v8_vm:destroy_context(VM, Context),
  211:     erlang_v8_vm:destroy_context(VM, Context2),
  212: 
  213:     erlang_v8:stop_vm(VM),
  214:     ok.
  215: 
  216: init_from_file(_Config) ->
  217:     Directory = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  218:     Path = filename:join(Directory, "js/variables.js"),
  219:     {ok, VM} = erlang_v8:start_vm([{file, Path}]),
  220:     {ok, Context} = erlang_v8_vm:create_context(VM),
  221: 
  222:     {ok, 3} = erlang_v8:eval(VM, Context, <<"z;">>),
  223: 
  224:     erlang_v8_vm:destroy_context(VM, Context),
  225: 
  226:     erlang_v8:stop_vm(VM),
  227:     ok.
  228: 
  229: multiple_vms(_Config) ->
  230:     {ok, VM1} = erlang_v8:start_vm(),
  231:     {ok, VM2} = erlang_v8:start_vm(),
  232: 
  233:     {ok, Context1} = erlang_v8_vm:create_context(VM1),
  234:     {ok, Context2} = erlang_v8_vm:create_context(VM2),
  235: 
  236:     {ok, undefined} = erlang_v8:eval(VM1, Context1, <<"var x = 1;">>),
  237:     {ok, undefined} = erlang_v8:eval(VM2, Context2, <<"var x = 2;">>),
  238: 
  239:     {ok, 1} = erlang_v8:eval(VM1, Context1, <<"x;">>),
  240:     {ok, 2} = erlang_v8:eval(VM2, Context2, <<"x;">>),
  241: 
  242:     erlang_v8_vm:destroy_context(VM1, Context1),
  243:     erlang_v8_vm:destroy_context(VM2, Context2),
  244: 
  245:     ok = erlang_v8:stop_vm(VM1),
  246:     ok = erlang_v8:stop_vm(VM2),
  247: 
  248:     ok.
  249: 
  250: big_input(_Config) ->
  251:     {ok, VM} = erlang_v8:start_vm([{max_source_size, 5000}]),
  252: 
  253:     {ok, Context} = erlang_v8_vm:create_context(VM),
  254: 
  255:     {ok, undefined} = erlang_v8:eval(VM, Context, <<"function call(arg) {
  256:         return arg;
  257:     }">>),
  258: 
  259:     {error, invalid_source_size} = erlang_v8:call(VM, Context, <<"call">>,
  260:                                                   [random_bytes(5000)]),
  261: 
  262:     {ok, _} = erlang_v8:call(VM, Context, <<"call">>, [random_bytes(500)]),
  263: 
  264:     ok = erlang_v8_vm:destroy_context(VM, Context),
  265: 
  266:     ok = erlang_v8:stop_vm(VM),
  267:     ok.
  268: 
  269: escaped_control_characters(_Config) ->
  270:     {ok, VM} = erlang_v8:start_vm(),
  271:     {ok, Context} = erlang_v8_vm:create_context(VM),
  272: 
  273:     {ok, undefined} = erlang_v8:eval(VM, Context, <<"function call(arg) {
  274:         return arg;
  275:     }">>),
  276:     Bytes = <<"\ntestar\nfestar\n">>,
  277:     {ok, <<"\ntestar\nfestar\n">>} = erlang_v8:call(VM, Context, <<"call">>,
  278:                                                     [Bytes]),
  279: 
  280:     ok = erlang_v8_vm:destroy_context(VM, Context),
  281:     ok = erlang_v8:stop_vm(VM),
  282:     ok.
  283: 
  284: performance(_Config) ->
  285:     {ok, P} = erlang_v8:start_vm(),
  286: 
  287:     {ok, Context} = erlang_v8_vm:create_context(P),
  288:     {ok, undefined} = erlang_v8:eval(P, Context,
  289:                                      <<"function retval(i) { return i; }">>),
  290: 
  291:     [{ok, I} = erlang_v8:call(P, Context, <<"retval">>, [I]) ||
  292:      I <- lists:seq(0, 999)],
  293: 
  294:     ok = erlang_v8_vm:destroy_context(P, Context),
  295: 
  296:     erlang_v8:stop_vm(P),
  297:     ok.
  298: 
  299: dead_proc(_Config) ->
  300:     {ok, P} = erlang_v8:start_vm(),
  301: 
  302:     Parent = self(),
  303:     spawn(fun() ->
  304:         {ok, Context} = erlang_v8:create_context(P),
  305:         Parent ! Context
  306:     end),
  307:     receive
  308:         Context ->
  309:             {error, invalid_context} = erlang_v8_vm:destroy_context(P, Context)
  310:     end,
  311: 
  312:     spawn(fun() ->
  313:         {ok, Context2} = erlang_v8:create_context(P),
  314:         ok = erlang_v8_vm:destroy_context(P, Context2),
  315:         Parent ! Context2
  316:     end),
  317:     receive
  318:         Context2 ->
  319:             {error, invalid_context} = erlang_v8_vm:destroy_context(P, Context2)
  320:     end,
  321: 
  322:     erlang_v8:stop_vm(P),
  323:     ok.
  324: 
  325: %% Helpers
  326: 
  327: random_bytes(N) ->
  328:     list_to_binary([rand:uniform(26) + 96 || _ <- lists:seq(0, N - 1)]).
